foda.

One of the best video game sequels of all time. This game takes what the first game did and expanded upon everything, even adding multiplayer. MULTIPLAYER. With 4 portals and all the new mechanics, so much could be done and this game takes full advantage of that. But what more COULD I even say? This game has been talked about to death and has been ingrained in video game culture. It's literally a gaming icon. To say more would be an insult to it because new players HAVE to experience it for themselves. What are you waiting for? Go and give this 10/10 game a shot.

Amazingly clever

a experiência definitiva em jogos de puzzle. portal 2 é perfeito em todos os aspectos: gráficos que fazem o seu trabalho, excelente trilha sonora e design de som, história perfeita, puzzles espertos e bem construídos, tudo isso torna o jogo excepcional. sua duração não tão longa faz com que ele jamais fique cansativo, e os seus diálogos bem humorados e personagens extremamente marcantes deixam a obra ainda mais brilhante. nota 10/10, um clássico incrível que merece ser jogado por todos, e merece toda a fama que conquistou ao longo dos anos!
Классная игра 10/10 стоит своих денег

It took nearly 12 hours to finish but it was worth it. The plot changed in big ways and i can't even count the amount of times i got headaches and got stuck on a level but i did it. I recommend you purchase the bundle that also includes Portal 1. Portal 1 is a quick game. You get a deal for the money if you get both in a bundle anyways so why not. That's what I did. For the price for the bundle for 16 hours of entertainment, it's a steal. Over all, what you get for the price is worth it. Note that this is what ( I ) think about.

Portal 2 has everything you'd expect, and more. Specifying what "more" means is difficult to do without stepping on your enjoyment of the game, but let me put it simply - It's one of the most amazing experiences in gameplay and story. Ever.
